fields_of_interest: Trade, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health
organisation_name: Federation of Lithuanian Forest and Wood Workers' Trade Unions (LMPF)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Comité consultatif pour la sécurité et la santé sur le lieu de travail#X01211# RUGINIENĖ Inga#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1211#Member#B#Other#Intérêt des représentants des travailleurs
goals__remit:
LMPF represents and defends the rights of trade union members. Actively participates in tripartite coordination of interests and cooperation, solving social, economic and labour issues, also participates in solving social and labour issues and disputes. 
LMPF promotes social dialoge, initiate bilateral collective agreements with employers’ organizations and organises 
training of trade union representatives and employees; periodically organize conferences, seminars, forums etc.
